item.title: Man Who Opened Fire on Texas Border Patrol Building Is Fatally Shot
item.description: The man opened fire on the building in McAllen, Texas, on Monday. A border patrol employee and two officers were injured, federal officials said.

item.title: Where Do Israel-Hamas Cease-Fire Negotiations Stand?
item.description: Hamas wants a guarantee that negotiations will lead to a permanent end to the Gaza war.

item.title: What’s at Stake as Netanyahu and Trump Meet in Washington
item.description: With the fighting in Iran over, President Trump is considering whether to pursue a new nuclear agreement with Tehran. He is also urging a new cease-fi...

item.title: Russian Minister Who Had Led Region Later Invaded by Ukraine Is Found Dead
item.description: Roman V. Starovoyt, the transport minister, had governed Russia’s western Kursk region before Ukrainian forces invaded in 2024 and occupied part of th...

item.title: Medical Societies Sue Kennedy and H.H.S. Over Vaccine Advice
item.description: New restrictions on Covid shots run counter to scientific evidence, the groups said.
